title: Decay warning while still playing ranked?
body: So I recently hit Diamond 4 and i understand that it is a 10 day decay, as in if you dont play for 10 days then you decay. Well i have been playing ranked roughly every day and my decay counter continues. Even when i play it will not reset and it is now down to 3. Will this screw me if it hits 0 or is it just a bug where it reaches 0 but doesnt do anything. I would hate to decay while still playing

replies.body: I checked up on your current ranked leagues and it looks like you've got a high rank in Solo as well as Flex SR. You're currently Diamond 4 in Ranked Solo so that decay warning miiiiight actually be referring to Flex SR. Hop in that queue really quick and let me know if that stops the decay!
I'm queueing for a flex now, Ill update tomorrow.
